programme.title: Les saisons de Pique-assiette
programme.sub-title: Tarte flambée aux oignons et lardons

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc:
Awakening the senses in Brière
Éric Guérin, Michelin-starred chef, has worked in the greatest Parisian restaurants. But it was in the heart of the Brière Regional Natural Park that, twenty-five years ago, he decided to open his own gastronomic restaurant, La Mare aux Oiseaux. Just like its creator, it is generous, modern and welcoming. Directed by: Christian Roche.
Presented by: Marine Barnérias.

programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Choux farcis et salade de pommes de terre à la salicorne
programme.desc: Stuffed cabbage and potato salad with samphire Arnaud Marchand is about to change the way you see cabbage, forever, as he cooks stuffed cabbage with shredded ribs, accompanied by a potato salad with samphire. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Ding dong : montre-moi ta maison !
programme.desc:
Episode 1

A little crooked house... but can a house really be crooked, literally? Who lives in a villa with direct lake access? How to blossom in a rainbow-coloured house next to a railway line? Viola Tami invites us to discover some surprising buildings and their occupants. Presented by: Viola Tami.

Directed by: Karen Ballmer (Switzerland, 2021)

programme.title: Académie française, voyage au pays des immortels
programme.desc:
With a touch of self-mockery, journalist and documentary-maker Serge Moati admits his dream of being admitted to the Académie Française. Not (yet) a member, he takes his camera to visit Quai Conti, a building dating back nearly four centuries. History, rites, customs, traditions and codes: the Académiciens reveal their secrets.

Directed by: Serge Moati (France, 2020)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Ready to do anything for Mila Ever since his early childhood, Artus has dreamed of having a pet. At 10 years old, after thinking long and hard about it and seeing how important it was for her son, his mother decided to offer him a little cat, Mila.

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: Le musicien et le royaume silencieux

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
MC Rocky goes freestyle
Rocky wants to become a rapper! It's time for MC Rocky to go with the flow.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Meurtres à Lille
programme.desc:
The body of Victor Maurin, a sculptor from Lille, is discovered just hours before an exhibition of his work opens. Stationed in Paris but originally from the region, Inspector Caroline Flament is asked to head the investigation. She meets up with her childhood friend, Astrid d'Armentières, the victim's scenographer...

Directed by: Laurence Katrian (France, 2018)

Screenplay: Isabel Sebastian

Cast: Annelise Hesme (Caroline Flament), Loup-Denis Élion (William Henry), Elsa Lunghini (Astrid d'Armentières), Adèle Choubard (Chloé Grimbert), Axel Auriant (Oscar d'Armentières), Christian Vantomme (Victor Maurin), Éva Darlan (Violaine Maurin)

Genre: detective

programme.title: Jane par Charlotte
programme.desc:
Charlotte Gainsbourg films her mother, Jane Birkin. An exchange that covers several years, gradually erasing the artists leaving just two people, a mother opposite her daughter, exposed in an intimate, unique and universal conversation.

Directed by: Charlotte Gainsbourg (France, 2020)

programme.title: Prémonitions
programme.desc: Episode 3: The truth Lili, in search of a new hiding place, returns to live in the house where she grew up. She is determined to bring her daughter back there as well and above all to tell her the truth about her power, because Félicia is trying to work out what really happened. Directed by: Charles-Olivier Michaud (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Patrick Lowe, Estelle Bouchard, Charles-Olivier Michaud Cast: Pascale Bussières (Clara Jacob), Sophie Desmarais (Liliane Jacob), Jade Charbonneau (Félicia Jacob), Mikhaïl Ahooja (Arnaud Jacob), Benoît Gouin (Jules Samson), Éric Bruneau (Pascal Deraspe), Liam Patenaude (Romain Jacib) Genre: drama Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: Prémonitions
programme.desc: Episode 4: The demons Facing the hostility of the people of Beltane, Lili opens up to her daughter and reveals the truth about the accident that left her with burns on her back. Clara confronts Jules about a worrying event in their past. Félicia tries to understand how her power works. Directed by: Charles-Olivier Michaud (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Patrick Lowe, Estelle Bouchard, Charles-Olivier Michaud Cast: Pascale Bussières (Clara Jacob), Sophie Desmarais (Liliane Jacob), Jade Charbonneau (Félicia Jacob), Mikhaïl Ahooja (Arnaud Jacob), Benoît Gouin (Jules Samson), Éric Bruneau (Pascal Deraspe), Liam Patenaude (Romain Jacib) Genre: drama Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.desc:
Appointment with death On the shores of the North Sea, the chambermaid from a former luxury hotel is murdered. Clémence, the owner, becomes the prime suspect. Flamboyant, authoritarian, cruel, particularly with her children, she has set her heart on making Swan Laurence her third husband. But soon Clémence is also found murdered...

Directed by: Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss (season 2, France, 2019)

Screenplay: Sylvie Simon, based on Agatha Christie

Cast: Samuel Labarthe (Swan Laurence), Blandine Bellavoir (Alice Avril), Élodie Frenck (Marlène), Cyril Gueï (Timothée Glissant), Mireille Herbstmeyer (Clémence Berg), Dominique Thomas (Ernest Tricard), Guillaume Bouchède (Philippe Berg), Clémence Aubry (Caroline Berg), Tom Hudson (Louis Berg)

Genre: detective

programme.title: Boris Vian, un coeur qui battait trop fort
programme.desc:
He loved life and celebrated it every way he could: literature, music, song, poetry, painting, science... Boris Vian knew that his heart condition wouldn't allow him to grow old; he passed away on 23 June 1959, aged just 39. We look back at the incredible career of a gifted artist.

Directed by: Sylvain Bergère (France, 2020)

programme.title: 400 millions de critiques
programme.desc:
The "400 Millions de Critiques" team has set up its studio at the Orlinski Gallery in Paris. Programme summary: "Fantasy", 9th studio album studio by M83; "L'Arche de Rantanplan", a new adventure for Lucky Luke; "La Vie pour de Vrai", by Dany Boon.
Guest: Richard Orlinski, French artist.
Presented by: Laura Tenoudji. With Sylvestre Defontaine, Michel Cerutti, Estelle Martin.

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 344 La « magie de Noël » réunit Gary et Alex pour le meilleur comme pour le pire. Parallèlement, Johanna se demande si une hospitalisation ne serait pas la meilleure solution. Réalisation : Jérôme Portheault, Marion Lallier, Yannick Saillet, David Durca (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Chrystelle Labaude (Élizabeth), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Robert (Manon), Naïma Rodric (Lucille), Aïssam Medhem (Akim), Shirley Bousquet (Laëtitia), Léonie Dahan-Lamort (Camille), Hubert Benhamdine (Christophe), Mathilde Jaillette (Johanna), Folco Marchi (Ludo), Benjamin Bourgois (Alex), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Jérémy Banster (Julien) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
